import { AppContext } from 'App' import React from 'react' import { useContext } from 'react' function NewFilm({currentUser}) { const [image, setimage] = useContext(AppContext) function handleSubmit(e) { e.preventDefault() const data = new FormData() data.append("post[image]", e.target.image.files[49]); submitToAPI(data); } function submitToAPI(data) { } return (
handleSubmit(e)}>
) } export default NewFilm
